scripts.check-master: git symbolic-ref --short HEAD | grep ^master$ > /dev/null || (echo "Not in 'master' branch. Aborting release"; return 1)
scripts.prerelease: npm run check-master && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch
